note.subject: Pants Reminder
note.body: Don't forget to wear pants this weekend!

note.subject: Rent is Due
note.body: Pay up or I will kindly break your legs.

note.subject: Bike Ride
note.body: Let's go on a bike ride this weekend!

note.subject: Groceries
note.body: Don't forget to pick up filet mingnon from Price Chopper.

note.subject: Princess Pollywog
note.body: Take the dog to the vet today at 6 pm.

note.subject: Important
note.body: Come with me if you want to live.
